display.title: Music Player Daemon
display.label: mpd
display.description: Music Player Daemon (MPD) is a flexible, powerful, server-side application for playing music. Through plugins and libraries it can play a variety of sound files while being controlled by its network protocol.

start.content:
#!/bin/bash

 mpd --no-daemon /home/app/mpd.conf &
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
PID_FILE=/run/engines/pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

template_files.content:
music_directory         "/home/fs/mpd/music"
playlist_directory      "/home/fs/mpd/playlists"
db_file                 "/home/fs/mpd/tag_cache"
log_file                "/home/fs/mpd/logs/mpd.log"
pid_file                "/run/engines/pid"
state_file              "/home/app/mpd/state"
sticker_file            "/home/fs/mpd/sticker.sql"
bind_to_address         "0.0.0.0"
port                           "6600"
log_level                      "default"
#zeroconf_enabled               "yes"

input {
        plugin "curl"
}
audio_output {
       type            "pulse"
       name            "My Pulse Output"
       server          "pulseaudio"         # optional
#       sink            "remote_server_sink"    # optional
}


id3v1_encoding                  "UTF-8"
